column2: wanting to emphasize Marci's kind nature
column3: wanting to reassure the speaker that Marci is not grumpy
column4: wanting to prevent any potential conflict between Marci and the speaker.

column1: Marci is usually a very kind and gentle person.
Marci is not the type of person to get grumpy easily.
Marci is always pleasant and cheerful.
Marci is not the type of person to show negative emotions.
Marci has a naturally calm demeanor.
